sense.def: Illness Sign Alternative Writing of kou jin 口噤 . A writing error. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 SW rou cong rong 肉蓯蓉： 破傷風病：口禁身強。肉蓯蓉切片晒乾，用一小盞，底上穿定，燒烟於 瘡上熏之，累效 , “It breaks illnesses of harm caused by wind with clenched jaw and a stiff body. Cut rou cong rong into pieces and dry them under the sun. Take a small bowl and pierce some [of the rou cong rong ] through a hole in the bottom where it is fixed. Then roast [this] and fumigate [the wound] with the smoke. This is often effective”.
